Election: May 2, 2026
---------------------

The City of Hamilton has three Council Member positions (one unexpired term and two two-year terms) and one Mayor position (two-year term) that will be voted on in the upcoming election.

City Hall, 200 E Main St. Hamilton, TX 76531

*Election Day*
: May 2, 2026 from 7:00 am - 7:00 pm

April 20, 2026 to April 28, 2026 from 7:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Mon-Thurs and 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. Fri

January 14, 2026 to February 13, 2026 from 7:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Mon - Thurs and 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. Fri  -
[Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1362)

*Last day to register to vote: April 2, 2026*

[Election Calendar](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1361)

[Application for Ballot by Mail](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1285)

Drawing for a Place on Ballot - Results of Drawing for Place on Ballot

[Notice of Voting Order Priority for Voters with Certain Disabilities](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1175)

### **Qualifications for Mayor and Council Members:**

Each of the council members and the mayor shall be a citizen of the United States of America, have been a resident of the State of Texas for a period of at least one (1) year, have been a resident of the city of Hamilton for a period of at least six (6) months, and be a qualified voter of the State of Texas.

In order to register to vote or to change your address, contact Terry Short, Hamilton County Tax Assessor-Collector, at 254-386-1200. April 2, 2026 is the last day for submitting a voter registration application in time to vote at the May Municipal Election.
